name: Poor Thief!
description:
“Something very special.” - TouchArcade, Game of the Week

“A puzzle gem” - PocketGamer, Game of the Week

You are the Poor Thief, a burglar cursed with immortality and an insatiable hunger for treasure. Swipe your way through dozens of levels, and remember - you can’t always avoid death. In fact, it’s the only way to win!

• Unique mechanic - to win, you must die!
• 3 unique worlds with over 50 levels total
• Earn stars by beating each level efficiently
• Catchy soundtrack by Lewmoth
• Unlockable mini-game

Help Poor Thief get the treasure, break the curse, and die a bunch along the way!
